name: VdoCipherKit
summary: Play your vdocipher videos on ios
description:
Provides a custom view which can be used to play your vdocipher videos. The custom view called
VdoPlayerView has a loadVideo method which can be used to play using otp and playbackInfo. The
View also provides a callback when video is ready. The View provides access to the instance of
AVPlayer which can be used to observe or read any parameters. The view does not provide controls
of its own. The instance of AVPlayer can be used to create any controls. The player is able to
play both FairPlay and non-FairPlay videos.
